page.title: 20ARMY BASE:PALACE BARRACKS
page.content: PALACE ARMY BARRACKS,WHICH IS SITUATED ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF HOLYWOOD,COVERS APPROXIMATELY FOUR SQUARE KILOMETRES. TWO ARMY BATTALIONS HAVE BEEN IN THE BARRACKS IN 1985,THE 1ST BATTALION, THE ROYAL HIGHLAND FUSILIERS WHO COMPLETED THEIR TOUR OF DUTY IN MARCH AND THE 1ST BATTALION, THE KING'S OWN ROYAL BORDER REGIMENT WHO REPLACED THEM.AN AVERAGE TOUR OF DUTY IN PALACE BARRACKS IS TWO YEARS. THE BARRACKS PROVIDES ACCOMMODATION FOR 480 SINGLE SOLDIERS OF ALL RANKS AS WELL AS QUARTERS FOR 400 FAMILIES. THE VAST MAJORITY OF MARRIED SOLDIERS ARE ACCOMPANIED ON DUTY BY THEIR FAMILIES,ONLY A TINY PROPORTION PREFERRING TO LEAVE THEM IN ENGLAND. A WIDE VARIETY OF FACILITIES ARE AVAILABLE FOR SOLDIERS TO USE OFF DUTY INCLUDING A SWIMMING POOL,SQUASH COURTS,SAUNAS,BARS AND A GYMNASIUM.
